basic_binary_oprimitive.hpp

00001 #ifndef BOOST_ARCHIVE_BASIC_BINARY_OPRIMITIVE_HPP
00002 #define BOOST_ARCHIVE_BASIC_BINARY_OPRIMITIVE_HPP
00003 
00004 // MS compatible compilers support #pragma once
00005 #if defined(_MSC_VER) && (_MSC_VER >= 1020)
00006 # pragma once
00007 #endif
00008 
00010 // basic_binary_oprimitive.hpp
00011

00018 
00019 // archives stored as native binary - this should be the fastest way
00020 // to archive the state of a group of obects.  It makes no attempt to
00021 // convert to any canonical form.
00022 
00023 // IN GENERAL, ARCHIVES CREATED WITH THIS CLASS WILL NOT BE READABLE
00024 // ON PLATFORM APART FROM THE ONE THEY ARE CREATE ON
00025 
00026 #include <iosfwd>
00027 #include <cassert>
00028 #include <locale>
00029 #include <streambuf> // basic_streambuf
00030 #include <string>
00031 #include <cstddef> // size_t
00032 
00033 #include <boost/config.hpp>
00034 #if defined(BOOST_NO_STDC_NAMESPACE)
00035 namespace std{ 
00036     using ::size_t; 
00037 } // namespace std
00038 #endif
00039 
00040 #include <boost/cstdint.hpp>
00041 //#include <boost/limits.hpp>
00042 //#include <boost/io/ios_state.hpp>
00043 #include <boost/scoped_ptr.hpp>
00044 #include <boost/serialization/throw_exception.hpp>
00045 
00046 #include <boost/archive/basic_streambuf_locale_saver.hpp>
00047 #include <boost/archive/archive_exception.hpp>
00048 #include <boost/archive/detail/auto_link_archive.hpp>
00049 #include <boost/serialization/is_bitwise_serializable.hpp>
00050 #include <boost/mpl/placeholders.hpp>
00051 #include <boost/serialization/array.hpp>
00052 #include <boost/archive/detail/abi_prefix.hpp> // must be the last header
00053 
00054 namespace boost {
00055 namespace archive {
00056 
00067 template<class Archive, class Elem, class Tr>
00068 class basic_binary_oprimitive
00069 {
00070 #ifndef BOOST_NO_MEMBER_TEMPLATE_FRIENDS
00071     friend class save_access;
00072 protected:
00073 #else
00074 public:
00075 #endif
00076     std::basic_streambuf<Elem, Tr> & m_sb;
00077     // return a pointer to the most derived class
00078     Archive * This(){
00079         return static_cast<Archive *>(this);
00080     }
00081     #ifndef BOOST_NO_STD_LOCALE
00082     boost::scoped_ptr<std::locale> archive_locale;
00083     basic_streambuf_locale_saver<Elem, Tr> locale_saver;
00084     #endif
00085     // default saving of primitives.
00086     template<class T>
00087     void save(const T & t)
00088     {
00089         save_binary(& t, sizeof(T));
00090     }
00091 
00093     // fundamental types that need special treatment
00094     
00095     // trap usage of invalid uninitialized boolean which would
00096     // otherwise crash on load.
00097     void save(const bool t){
00098         assert(0 == static_cast<int>(t) || 1 == static_cast<int>(t));
00099         save_binary(& t, sizeof(t));
00100     }
00101     BOOST_ARCHIVE_OR_WARCHIVE_DECL(void)
00102     save(const std::string &s);
00103     #ifndef BOOST_NO_STD_WSTRING
00104     BOOST_ARCHIVE_OR_WARCHIVE_DECL(void)
00105     save(const std::wstring &ws);
00106     #endif
00107     BOOST_ARCHIVE_OR_WARCHIVE_DECL(void)
00108     save(const char * t);
00109     BOOST_ARCHIVE_OR_WARCHIVE_DECL(void)
00110     save(const wchar_t * t);
00111 
00112     BOOST_ARCHIVE_OR_WARCHIVE_DECL(void)
00113     init();
00114     
00115     BOOST_ARCHIVE_OR_WARCHIVE_DECL(BOOST_PP_EMPTY()) 
00116     basic_binary_oprimitive(
00117         std::basic_streambuf<Elem, Tr> & sb, 
00118         bool no_codecvt
00119     );
00120     BOOST_ARCHIVE_OR_WARCHIVE_DECL(BOOST_PP_EMPTY()) 
00121     ~basic_binary_oprimitive();
00122 public:
00123 
00124     // we provide an optimized save for all fundamental types
00125     // typedef serialization::is_bitwise_serializable<mpl::_1> 
00126     // use_array_optimization;
00127     // workaround without using mpl lambdas
00128     struct use_array_optimization {
00129         template <class T>  
00130         #if defined(BOOST_NO_DEPENDENT_NESTED_DERIVATIONS)  
00131             struct apply {  
00132                 typedef BOOST_DEDUCED_TYPENAME boost::serialization::is_bitwise_serializable<T>::type type;  
00133             };
00134         #else
00135             struct apply : public boost::serialization::is_bitwise_serializable<T> {};  
00136         #endif
00137     };
00138     
00139 
00140     // the optimized save_array dispatches to save_binary 
00141     template <class ValueType>
00142     void save_array(boost::serialization::array<ValueType> const& a, unsigned int)
00143     {
00144       save_binary(a.address(),a.count()*sizeof(ValueType));
00145     }
00146 
00147     void save_binary(const void *address, std::size_t count);
00148 };
00149 
00150 template<class Archive, class Elem, class Tr>
00151 inline void 
00152 basic_binary_oprimitive<Archive, Elem, Tr>::save_binary(
00153     const void *address, 
00154     std::size_t count
00155 ){
00156     //assert(
00157     //    static_cast<std::size_t>((std::numeric_limits<std::streamsize>::max)()) >= count
00158     //);
00159     // note: if the following assertions fail
00160     // a likely cause is that the output stream is set to "text"
00161     // mode where by cr characters recieve special treatment.
00162     // be sure that the output stream is opened with ios::binary
00163     //if(os.fail())
00164     //    boost::serialization::throw_exception(
00165     //        archive_exception(archive_exception::stream_error)
00166     //    );
00167     // figure number of elements to output - round up
00168     count = ( count + sizeof(Elem) - 1) 
00169         / sizeof(Elem);
00170     std::streamsize scount = m_sb.sputn(
00171         static_cast<const Elem *>(address), 
00172         count
00173     );
00174     if(count != static_cast<std::size_t>(scount))
00175         boost::serialization::throw_exception(
00176             archive_exception(archive_exception::stream_error)
00177         );
00178     //os.write(
00179     //    static_cast<const BOOST_DEDUCED_TYPENAME OStream::char_type *>(address), 
00180     //    count
00181     //);
00182     //assert(os.good());
00183 }
00184 
00185 } //namespace boost 
00186 } //namespace archive 
00187 
00188 #include <boost/archive/detail/abi_suffix.hpp> // pop pragmas
00189 
00190 #endif // BOOST_ARCHIVE_BASIC_BINARY_OPRIMITIVE_HPP
